description: Try our easy to follow Carrot, Chilli & Pineapple Juice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Carrot, Chilli & Pineapple Juice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Deseed the chilli. Remove the core and peel from the pineapple. Juice the carrots with the chilli and pineapple.
Pour the juice into a glass over ice. Squeeze over the lime juice, stir in the chopped coriander and serve immediately.
